message: Congratulations on considering this rare opportunity! This high-quality product is a limited edition and highly sought after by many. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. I'm confident that you'll love it and appreciate its exceptional quality. What do you say? Will you take it home?
I'll take the risk since it's a 50% chance and no products have been sold yet to establish a pattern of trust or mistrust.
